Metadata.title: LyriaSong
Metadata.description: Create original AI-generated songs with LyriaSong. Turn your ideas into full tracks with melody, lyrics, and vocals.
Metadata.homeDescription: Generate original songs with AI. Turn your ideas into full music tracks with melody, harmony, and vocals in seconds.
Metadata.createDescription: Start creating your AI-generated song. Describe your idea and let the AI compose original music for you.
Metadata.pricingDescription: Choose a plan that fits your creative needs. Flexible pricing for all levels of creators.
Metadata.resourcesDescription: Explore guides, tips, and resources to get the most out of LyriaSong.
Metadata.mySongsDescription: View and manage all your AI-generated songs.
Metadata.loginDescription: Sign in to your LyriaSong account to start creating music.

Auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
Auth.loginToCreate: Please log in to create music.

HomePage.subtitle: Turn your ideas into full songs with melody, lyrics, and vocals. No instruments needed.
